name: Dr. Bronner's Pure-Castile Baby Unscented Bar Soap 140g
description:
Dr. Bronner’s has been doing it right for decades. What’s "it" you ask? In this case, the answer is unscented baby soap that’s well-suited for sensitive skin. Enjoy the soft, smooth lather on your body, face or hair, and avoid the eyes for a tear-free clean at bath-time.Formulation is fragrance-free with double the olive oil of standard Dr. Bronner's soap.Biodegradable.Vegan.Comes in a post-consumer recycled wrapper.Made with organic and Fair Trade Certified ingredients.Not tear-free. Keep out of baby's eyes.
